CHELSEA PLAN ALLI BID

Chelsea are prepared to make a potentially world-record breaking record offer for Tottenham midfielder Dele Alli, according to Don Balon .

Antonio Conte is keen to make a statement during this transfer window, and wants to buy Alli despite him having a pricetag in excess of €100 million.

Romelu Lukaku is also a target for Conte despite his own asking price being in the same region as that of Alli.

【轉會吹風站】華拉堤為投巴塞拒跟操

【now.com體育】有傳意大利國腳馬高華拉堤為離開巴黎聖日耳門，已決定一不做、二不休，實行隊照歸、操不跟！

西班牙《馬卡報》指
，受到巴塞隆拿覬覦的馬高華拉堤（Marco Verratti），為了轉會不惜與聖日耳門作對，目前雖然已結束假期並返回巴黎報到，卻是心在曹營心在漢。

據知，24歲中場指揮官華拉堤已回到大本營，但只願意留在健身室谷體能，拒絕與隊友一起練習，且堅持跟隨個人的訓練計劃進行，而非球隊的季前安排，畫公仔已畫出腸。

由於聖日耳門索價1億歐元，拜仁慕尼黑已明確表示退出爭奪戰，惟巴塞至今仍未提出正式報價，《世界體育報》消息指，會長巴圖美將於本周前往法國洽談，但轉會費難以開價超過8000萬歐元。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

哥迪奧拿：曼城要10年追上皇巴

【now.com體育】曼城領隊哥迪奧拿表示需要10年時間，方能把藍月亮打造成巴塞隆拿、皇家馬德里般的班霸級球隊。

哥迪奧拿（Pep Guardiola）領導西甲的巴塞隆拿、德甲的拜仁慕尼黑奪標無數，上季首度執教英超富豪球會曼城卻4大皆空，最終僅獲季軍兼歐聯分組賽資格，部份城迷並不收貨。

哥帥最近接受西班牙傳媒訪問時嘗試辯解：「我希望於首季教得歡樂，因我十分享受這份工作。有人說球隊情況並不理想，成績跟我以往領軍合共贏得6屆聯賽冠軍並不符合。曼城是一支出色球隊，但要像巴塞、皇馬、拜仁、祖雲達斯等級數的勁旅，這非常複雜，亦需要時間，可能長達10年。」

該名西班牙籍教頭補充：「我們正嘗試作出需要的改變，壯大球隊實力。我們是聯賽其中一支最老的球隊，一支球隊若已獲得很多成功，同時亦意味球隊已相當年老。我們引入加比爾捷西斯、根度簡與利萊辛尼，把球隊年輕化。我總是在想假如全年都能派遣高柏尼、加比爾捷西斯及根度簡，球隊已經獲得成功。」

圖片來源 : 互聯網

Tuttomercatoweb believes the signing in question to be Atalanta right-back Andrea Conti after deals for Lucas Biglia and Nikola Kalinic went cold.

Milan have reportedly given up on Andrea Bertolacci and are prepared to sell him for just €10m – half of what they paid for the midfielder two years ago.

Bertolacci joined Milan for €20m in the summer of 2015, after a season that saw him emerge as one of Serie A’s most impressive midfielders and break into the Italy squad.

However, he made just 48 appearances in his two campaigns at San Siro, and Calciomercato.com claims Milan have accepted that his transfer did not work out.

The website cites the 26-year-old’s “lack of personality, weakness in character, tactical misunderstandings and, above all, injuries” as the reasons for his failings at Milan.

Consequently, Bertolacci’s agent Alessandro Lucci is said to be working on finding a way out for the player, with Fiorentina, Atalanta and former club Genoa “following him closely”.

The development comes just two weeks after Lucci insisted his client was staying with the Rossoneri.

中國「大水喉」射住 愛華頓獲6000萬鎊借貸

【now.com體育】愛華頓今夏積極擴軍，其轉會支出令人咋舌，原來拖肥與中國工商銀行達成融資協議，從銀行借貸6000萬鎊，冀透過今次合作開拓中國市場。

根據《利物浦迴聲》的報道，中國工商銀行同意向愛華頓提供6000萬鎊的3年信貸安排，今次是這間中資銀行首度與英超球會合作，倫敦分行客戶關係經理Jothann Durnall接受訪問時表示：「我們很高興和愛華頓達成融資協議，能夠和雄心壯志的球會合作實在令人激動，我們期待這間球會在未來取得成功。」

愛華頓在上月尾已經獲得英超賽會批准，可以隨時動用這筆6000萬鎊的貸款，意味著拖肥今夏已經不需要透過放售球員去換取資金，球會總監懷辛斯夫（Sasha Ryazantsev）補充指：「是次的合作將令球隊財政變得更靈活，降低融資成本及再融資的風險。而且我們的股東在過去1年不斷作出貢獻，所以愛華頓現時資金充裕，能夠進行長期的投資。」

愛華頓死敵利物浦一早已經進入中國市場，不甘後人的拖肥亦希望透過今次的合作，把球會打入中國市場，懷辛斯夫指出：「和中國工商銀行的新關係，是我們進入中國市場的重要一步，冀望未來進一步發展於中國的商機。」

這筆融資交易將獨立進行，不會影響愛華頓與利物浦議會的3億鎊融資協議，同時愛華頓未來與其他金融機構達成任何新協議，也不會影響是次的交易。

Milan are reportedly waiting for the Chinese transfer window to shut later this month before they pursue a deal for Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.

According to Gazzetta dello Sport, Nikola Kalinic is not Milan’s only striking target as they are working on “another big coup” for Aubameyang.

The newspaper explains Fabio Cannavaro’s Tianjin Quanjian remain keen on the Borussia Dortmund attacker but have until July 15 to sign him.

The Rossoneri are said to have recently offered Aubameyang €7.5m a season, but that was considered some way below Tianjin’s proposal.

However, Chinese clubs have been dealt several blows to their free-spending ways, meaning Milan may feel positive about their chances.

Aubameyang was a Diavolo youth player but left for Saint-Etienne in 2011 before joining Dortmund two years later.

The 28-year-old would cost in excess of €50m, but there is the argument that the outlay is necessary for bringing in a player of his calibre.

As for Kalinic, Milan will not go over €20m for the Croat, who is valued at €30m by Fiorentina.

Atalanta have reportedly made an offer to sign Juventus midfielder Tomas Rincon.

According to Gianluca Di Marzio’s website, Atalanta see Rincon as a “welcome” addition, especially as they need squad depth for the Europa League next season.

The Peruvian was also coached by Gian Piero Gasperini at Genoa, the trainer having brought him to the Grifone in 2014.

Rincon joined Juve back in January for 8m and made 19 appearances for the Bianconeri, although they equated to little over six starts’ worth of action.

uventus have reportedly joined the race to sign Monaco starlet Kylian Mbappe.

Tuttosport cites a report in Le Parisien that claims Juve are among a clutch of elite clubs that are “closely following the situation of the French gem”.

The other five sides are said to be Real Madrid, Paris Saint-Germain, Arsenal, Barcelona, Liverpool, Manchester City and Chelsea.

However, reports in Spain suggest Madrid are best placed to sign the 18-year-old attacker.

“Mbappe to Madrid this year? I don’t know,” President Florentino Perez is quoted as saying last week.

“We have to decide whether to take him and let him play or if it’s better for him to stay where he is and gain more experience. Zidane must give me the ‘OK’.”

Juve are currently on the lookout for an attacker capable of playing on the left wing, and Mbappe would certainly fill that void.
